docs.text: Word Embeddings Visualisations The visualisations from below were obtained after training Word2Vec embeddings on the corpus of tweets. Hyperparameters are optimised by minimising the median ranking of a list of given word pairs. The vectors are projected into a two-dimensional space using the TSNE method.
